title: Exploring the Phenomena and Implications of Online Science Teaching Experiences

context.additional_context: Strengthening immediately applicable science education competencies in real-world professional settings.

learning_goals: Explanation of at least three instructional strategies for effectively delivering scientific concepts in online environments
Design of learner engagement methods in non-face-to-face classes by applying them to real-world cases
Submission of project outcomes reflecting the new possibilities and limitations of online science education from a phenomenological perspective

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
